Task description: Go to https://github.com, search for 'python/cpython', and verify that the repository page title contains 'cpython'.
Open https://pypi.org/project/requests/ and read the version number displayed next to the package title.
Visit https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?src=en.indian%23holiday%40group.v.calendar.google.com and list the holidays shown for the current month.
Go to https://letcode.in/button and click the 'Goto Home' button. Verify redirection to LetCode homepage.
Visit https://letcode.in/file and download all available files. Verify that download links exist.
Go to https://letcode.in/slider and slide to at least 50. Confirm value reflects change.
Open https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/add_remove_elements/, add 10 elements and remove 5. Verify 5 remain.
Go to https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/hovers, hover over the first figure and confirm user name is shown.
Visit https://www.wikipedia.org/ and count the number of hyperlinks on the page.
Visit https://www.python.org/, extract the text of the latest blog post title under 'Latest News'.
Go to https://www.wikipedia.org/, search for 'Artificial Intelligence', and confirm that the article title matches.
Go to https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/javascript_alerts and input text into JS prompt. Confirm response.
Visit https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/infinite_scroll and scroll until 2 new blocks appear.
Search 'python list comprehension' on Stack Overflow, open top result, and extract top-voted code block.
Go to https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/python-programming-language/ and list titles of the first 5 tutorials.
Go to https://www.google.com, type 'openai' in search bar and capture top 5 suggestions.
Open https://openai.com and return the title of the homepage.
Visit https://fr.wikipedia.org and verify if page language is French.
Search 'weather Chennai' on https://www.google.com and extract temperature.
Visit https://www.python.org and count total number of image elements.
Go to https://www.bbc.com/news and list top 3 headlines.
Visit https://www.openai.com and get the URL of the 'Contact' page.
Visit https://github.com and scroll to the bottom. Confirm footer is visible.
Visit https://www.python.org and extract the meta description from the HTML.
Go to https://www.wikipedia.org and list all available language options displayed on the homepage.

Go to https://www.flipkart.com. Search for Samsung Galaxy S23 ultra. From the search results, identify a listing for the Samsung Galaxy S23 that is in stock and available for purchase. Confirm it is not sold out.
Go to google.com, search for LED TVs and check it returned the results.

Open your web browser and navigate to https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login. Enter 'Admin' in the Username field. Enter 'admin123' in the Password field. Click on the 'Login' button. Verify that the login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard.
